scripts.build_services: ng build totvs-gps-services && cd dist/totvs-gps-services && npm pack
scripts.build_controls: ng build totvs-gps-controls && cd dist/totvs-gps-controls && npm pack
scripts.build_utils: ng build totvs-gps-utils && cd dist/totvs-gps-utils && npm pack
scripts.build_zoom: ng build totvs-gps-zoom && cd dist/totvs-gps-zoom && npm pack
scripts.build_crud: ng build totvs-gps-crud && cd dist/totvs-gps-crud && npm pack
scripts.build_custom: ng build totvs-gps-custom && cd dist/totvs-gps-custom && npm pack
scripts.build_all: npm run build_services && npm run build_controls && npm run build_utils && npm run build_zoom && npm run build_crud && npm run build_custom
